评论详情: Absolutely love this wallet! Originally bought for my husband, but I ended up using it myself because it was love at first sight. Its compact design fits perfectly in my fanny pack, yet it holds an impressive number of cards. The pop-up card feature makes accessing my cards incredibly easy and convenient. Plus, the sleek carbon fiber finish and RFID blocking provide both style and security. Highly recommend!

This wallet focuses on card storage, which makes sense since we carry more cards and fewer bills these days. Pressing the button ejects the cards from the case, which is kind of fun. The cover material feels smooth to the touch.

After just a couple months the screws fell out, making the entire wallet fall apart.  Not great, and because the screws are so small I don't know when they fell out nor can they be found easily to replace them.

This wallet is pretty good. The design is simple and sleek, with plenty of card slots. The best and most convenient feature is the automatic card pop-up mechanism. Just insert the cards, press the button on the side, and they pop up smoothly without getting stuck. It can hold at least three cards, making it well worth the price.

The wallet itself is well made, and works as it should.  I would give it a 5 star rating, but it has worn a hole in my pocket from the metal edge rubbing.  Not sure how to remedy this situation with the wallet.  I do love the product, just upset that the wallet is doing damage to my pants.

This isn't that slim, no doubt because of the pop-up mechanics.  The pop-up mechanism is neat for sure.  Also, the somewhat sharp corners don't make it easy to extract it from pants pockets.  All the internal slots are VERY tight and will only permit a hard credit card.  Extracting the card from the internal slots varies from difficult to "tools required".  (I'm not kidding)But the deal breaker for me was that there is no way to store business cards.  The business cards will also not fit in the pop-up deal. (they just fall out by gravity)
I have lost 2 credit cards due to the poorly made wallet.  Now I am out of my warranty for return so I am stuck with a faulty product.
So I bought this a couple of months ago. I love the sizes it started off working really well. But while in my pocket it separate and my cards fell out.
Product worked great for 6 months. Now the button won't push the cards up anymore and that's the whole point.  A lot of money wasted. Don't buy!

I find this wallet well-suited for me. It easily holds my 6 usual credit cards, my license and insurance card and a small amount of cash. I would not call it "minimalist" because it is still a full-size wallet, but it is slim profile. You cannot cram a ton of stuff into it as you can with classic trifold wallets, and you cannot carry a ton of cash. I use it without the money clip and tuck my emergency $100 bill behind my license. I like how the push button raises the cards in a staggered manner, though the button takes a firm push to activate. I have had no issues with cards falling out of the wallet, though I also don't toss it around. I cannot assess the RFID-blocking capability, but it is cool-looking. Maybe a bit pricey at $40 for how much it holds.

Took a few tries but I finally found a credit card wallet that I like. I’m happy with the size and money clip. Pushes my cards up. Hold a bunch. Easy button on side. So far has held up to use. Price was fair.

I recently got the Slim Leather Men's Wallet in Carbon Fiber, and it's fantastic. The quality is impressive, and the slim design fits perfectly in any pocket. 评论概述: Durable, sleek and full of extra space.
评论详情: I have been looking for a wallet like this for some time and like many other products, Amazon carries a lot of them. I liked this wallet so much that I recommended it to my mom as a father's day gift idea for my dad. I have always needed to clean up my wallets. I am one of those guys who would typically buy those massive leather wallets, store as much as I could in them and kept them for years and years. The nice thing about wallets like these is it forces you to clean up your wallet and not carry every single card you own on the planet. The locking feature works well and when unlocked, the cards come up smoothly staggered. I can see every card easily, and am able to access it conveniently. It comes with a metal clip that can be installed on the inside flap for cash (comes with a small screwdriver and extra screws). The magnetic closure works well and is strong enough to keep it closed (even if you have a couple layers of cash). Great deal, great durability and overall great product. 10/10 I recommend!

What I love about this minimalist wallet is that the appearance, along with the leather outing, makes it look so durable. The feel is right in your hands.  The card holder holds my cards. So far, I have three in there. (Drivers license, ATM card, & credit card) They stay put & the cards pop out easily.  The performance of the wallet does what it does. The money clip keeps the bills secure. It works best with 10 bills or less. Just so you know. The front and back have 2 card slots for more storage.  I'm happy with my purchase.

I'm not worried about any of the pockets ripping. Plus, it can hold just enough cash for those few instances when you actually need paper money. For someone like me who still has a collection of individual store cards, as well as a bunch of credit cards, it is the perfect amount of space.
